description.value:
Requirements You have a hand free and are adjacent to an ally who isn't at full Hit Points.

You perform a token medical effort to convince an ally they've recovered from an injury. Attempt a Deception check with the same DC as for @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Treat Wounds]. On a success, the target gains temporary Hit Points equal to half the corresponding amount of Hit Points from Treat Wounds. These temporary Hit Points last 1 round. Kiss It Better doesn't remove the wounded condition. The target is temporarily immune to Kiss It Better for 24 hours.
